content.en: Bus Optimization: Researchers have been using algorithms to address various challenges in bus transportation. These algorithms are designed to optimize bus timetables, bus services, bus routing, and other aspects of bus operations. For example, genetic algorithms, bi-level optimization approaches, and heuristic algorithms are being used to improve bus travel times, reduce waiting times for passengers, and minimize operational costs. These algorithms are proving to be effective in creating more efficient and comfortable bus services for passengers.
content.da: Busoptimering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer inden for bustransport. Disse algoritmer er designet til at optimere bustidsplaner, busdrift, busruter og andre aspekter af busoperationer. For eksempel bruges genetiske algoritmer, bi-niveau optimeringsmetoder og heuristiske algoritmer til at forbedre bustider, reducere ventetid for passagerer og minimere driftsomkostninger.
